name: 2048-9L
overview: 2048-9L is an updated version of Csabo's own 2014 version. This version qualifies as an official sequel since it was made by the same developer. Like the original conversion of the popular puzzle game, this too was released by the scene group Legion of Doom. The game was released on March 2, 2020. This version was coded in BASIC for the 2020 BASIC 10 Liners Competition using only 9 lines of code, which is where the 9L portion of the game's title comes from.
